meanings.definition: The activity or profession of being a pundit.
meanings.sent1: Her punditry on the news channel is always insightful.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the punditry in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: His punditry about the weather made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The world of punditry can be a maze of differing opinions.
meanings.sent5: The art of punditry requires careful analysis and clear communication.

meanings.definition: The opinions or commentary of a pundit.
meanings.sent1: I respect her punditry on political matters.
meanings.sent2: The punditry on the talk show was quite engaging.
meanings.sent3: His punditry on fashion trends is always amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of sports, punditry can be both exciting and controversial.
meanings.sent5: The punditry of experts can help us understand complex issues better.
